lines.text: Look, I don't want to keep you from your school work...
I drop out of school Patty, or at least I tried to... God, are you always like this?
You make everything look so different to me Patty...
Like everything... everything else just seems pointless comparing to being with you, like... what am i doing in school? I don't know... I'm afraid I might never see you again... will I?
Well yeah, you see me... I'm right here...
you get turn out the school?
not yet... but I look at you and I knew that I would be...
I know that sounds ridiculous to you, but I'm do it. I would I do anything for you...
If you left, Ya... I'm hopefully left
